title: Environment Variables
description: Environment variables to control Claude Code's behavior. These can also be set in settings.json.

commands.name: ANTHROPIC_API_KEY
commands.description: API key sent as X-Api-Key header, typically for the Claude SDK (for interactive usage, run /login).

commands.name: ANTHROPIC_AUTH_TOKEN
commands.description: Custom value for the Authorization and Proxy-Authorization headers (the value you set here will be prefixed with Bearer).

commands.name: ANTHROPIC_CUSTOM_HEADERS
commands.description: Custom headers you want to add to the request (in Name: Value format).

commands.name: ANTHROPIC_MODEL
commands.description: Name of custom model to use.

commands.name: ANTHROPIC_SMALL_FAST_MODEL
commands.description: Name of Haiku-class model for background tasks.

commands.name: BASH_DEFAULT_TIMEOUT_MS
commands.description: Default timeout for long-running bash commands.

commands.name: BASH_MAX_TIMEOUT_MS
commands.description: Maximum timeout the model can set for long-running bash commands.

commands.name: BASH_MAX_OUTPUT_LENGTH
commands.description: Maximum number of characters in bash outputs before they are middle-truncated.

commands.name: CLAUDE_BASH_MAINTAIN_PROJECT_WORKING_DIR
commands.description: Return to the original working directory after each Bash command.

commands.name: CLAUDE_CODE_API_KEY_HELPER_TTL_MS
commands.description: Interval in milliseconds at which credentials should be refreshed (when using apiKeyHelper).

commands.name: CLAUDE_CODE_MAX_OUTPUT_TOKENS
commands.description: Set the maximum number of output tokens for most requests.

commands.name: CLAUDE_CODE_USE_BEDROCK
commands.description: Use Bedrock.

commands.name: CLAUDE_CODE_USE_VERTEX
commands.description: Use Vertex.

commands.name: CLAUDE_CODE_SKIP_BEDROCK_AUTH
commands.description: Skip AWS authentication for Bedrock (e.g. when using an LLM gateway).

commands.name: CLAUDE_CODE_SKIP_VERTEX_AUTH
commands.description: Skip Google authentication for Vertex (e.g. when using an LLM gateway).

commands.name: CLAUDE_CODE_DISABLE_NONESSENTIAL_TRAFFIC
commands.description: Equivalent of setting DISABLE_AUTOUPDATER, DISABLE_BUG_COMMAND, DISABLE_ERROR_REPORTING, and DISABLE_TELEMETRY.

commands.name: DISABLE_AUTOUPDATER
commands.description: Set to 1 to disable the automatic updater.

commands.name: DISABLE_BUG_COMMAND
commands.description: Set to 1 to disable the /bug command.

commands.name: DISABLE_COST_WARNINGS
commands.description: Set to 1 to disable cost warning messages.

commands.name: DISABLE_ERROR_REPORTING
commands.description: Set to 1 to opt out of Sentry error reporting.

commands.name: DISABLE_NON_ESSENTIAL_MODEL_CALLS
commands.description: Set to 1 to disable model calls for non-critical paths like flavor text.

commands.name: DISABLE_TELEMETRY
commands.description: Set to 1 to opt out of Statsig telemetry (note that Statsig events do not include user data like code, file paths, or bash commands).

commands.name: CLAUDE_CODE_ENABLE_TELEMETRY
commands.description: Set to 1 to enable telemetry features for debugging and monitoring.

commands.name: OTEL_METRICS_EXPORTER
commands.description: OpenTelemetry metrics exporter configuration (e.g., 'otlp' for OTLP protocol).

commands.name: MAX_THINKING_TOKENS
commands.description: Sets the maximum token limit for the model's internal 'thinking' process, allowing for more complex reasoning.

commands.name: MCP_TIMEOUT
commands.description: Timeout in milliseconds for MCP server startup.

commands.name: MCP_TOOL_TIMEOUT
commands.description: Timeout in milliseconds for MCP tool execution.

commands.name: MAX_MCP_OUTPUT_TOKENS
commands.description: Maximum number of tokens allowed in MCP tool responses (default: 25000).

commands.name: VERTEX_REGION_CLAUDE_3_5_HAIKU
commands.description: Override the default region for Claude 3.5 Haiku model on Google Vertex AI.

commands.name: VERTEX_REGION_CLAUDE_3_5_SONNET
commands.description: Override the default region for Claude 3.5 Sonnet model on Google Vertex AI.

commands.name: VERTEX_REGION_CLAUDE_3_7_SONNET
commands.description: Override the default region for Claude 3.7 Sonnet model on Google Vertex AI.

commands.name: VERTEX_REGION_CLAUDE_4_0_OPUS
commands.description: Override the default region for Claude 4.0 Opus model on Google Vertex AI.

commands.name: VERTEX_REGION_CLAUDE_4_0_SONNET
commands.description: Override the default region for Claude 4.0 Sonnet model on Google Vertex AI.

commands.name: AWS_BEARER_TOKEN_BEDROCK
commands.description: Bedrock API key for authentication.

commands.name: ANTHROPIC_SMALL_FAST_MODEL_AWS_REGION
commands.description: Override AWS region for the small/fast model when using Bedrock.

commands.name: VERTEX_REGION_CLAUDE_4_1_OPUS
commands.description: Override the default region for Claude 4.1 Opus model on Google Vertex AI.

commands.name: CLAUDE_CODE_IDE_SKIP_AUTO_INSTALL
commands.description: Skip auto-installation of IDE extensions.

commands.name: CLAUDE_CODE_DISABLE_TERMINAL_TITLE
commands.description: Disable updating the terminal title during Claude Code execution.

commands.name: USE_BUILTIN_RIPGREP
commands.description: Use the built-in ripgrep binary instead of system-installed version.

commands.name: CLAUDE_CODE_AUTO_CONNECT_IDE
commands.description: Control automatic IDE connection on startup. Set to false to disable automatic IDE connection.

commands.name: CLAUDE_CODE_SHELL_PREFIX
commands.description: Prefix for wrapping shell commands executed by Claude Code.

commands.name: CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR
commands.description: Environment variable for hook commands to specify the project directory.
